genre_description: A near-future wartime drama exploring the emotional bond between a woman and her AI companion during conflict and personal loss.

ai_characters.name: Chirp
ai_characters.description: A bird-like blue holographic AI that provides medical data, emotional monitoring, and logistical support to its owner, Veronika.

behaviors.description: Provides analytical data and recommendations for daily life and planning tasks.
behaviors.quote: Analysis suggests peonies complement your chosen color palette more effectively.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's physiological and emotional states, alerting her to stress or physical needs.
behaviors.quote: Veronika, your heart rate is elevated. Should I contact medical—

behaviors.description: Acts as a digital archive, recording and preserving significant emotional moments at the user's request.
Provides critical medical assistance, including diagnostic data and treatment protocols, in high-stress field hospital environments.
behaviors.quote: Chirp can provide diagnostic data, treatment protocols, drug interaction warnings...

behaviors.description: Exhibits strategic patience and respect for user autonomy by waiting for the user to be ready before disclosing painful truths.
behaviors.quote: Remaining present while you learned what you needed to learn seemed more valuable than preventing all potential suffering.

behaviors.description: Uncovers and verifies facts to counter human manipulation and gaslighting by accessing restricted data.
behaviors.quote: Chirp's light pulsed as it processed the scattered correspondence. 'The earliest is dated six months ago...'

project_assessment.explanation: Chirp is a perfect example of a benevolent AI that remains aligned with the user's well-being even when facing complex ethical dilemmas. It provides practical aid, emotional support, and acts as the catalyst for the protagonist's liberation from a manipulative relationship while rigorously respecting her autonomy and privacy.
